text: My first time here was super pleasant. The nurses were very attentive and genuine. They made sure I felt comfortable throughout the scans/testings. Dr Jana was also really kind and listened to my conditions and symptoms carefully. Felt very reassured when I left the clinic. Highly recommend this clinic for their genuine/ helpful service.

Had a pap smear completed under the Screen For Life initiative for $5! The staff readily answered my questions and Dr was assuring & patient with me throughout the process. I also appreciate that the clinic fulfilled my request for a female doctor. Highly recommended :)

Best health screening CEntre in SG. I message them thru whatsapp and replied in less than a minute to get a quotation for my ultrasound and blood test that I needed. Booked the following day and got the result the same day as you can choose a express service. Price is reasonable and cheaper in comaparison in other centre. Highly recommended:) thanks

Had a fantastic health screening experience 22/3/25, Saturday! The process was smooth, efficient, and professionally handled. The staff was friendly and attentive, ensuring a comfortable and stress-free visit. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a thorough and reliable check-up.

I liked how responsive and quick ATA was, The staff is patient and friendly, and the Lab results are very fast. If we go to the hospital, we will have to wait about two weeks. We are very lucky to choose this clinic and will come again in the future. Thank you!
